summary.span: 如果 是项定义元数据或项元数据，则此字段会分别指定项定义或项的项类型。

span.span: If a is an item definition metadata or item metadata, this field specified the item type of the item definition or the item, respectively.

summary.span: 对于通用属性，不得设置此字段。

span.span: For common properties this field must not be set.
The item type of the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 是项定义元数据或项元数据，则此字段将分别指定项定义或项的项类型。If a is an item definition metadata or item metadata, this field specifies the item type of the item definition or the item, respectively. 对于通用属性，不能设置此字段。For common properties, this field must not be set.

summary.span: 属性/项定义元数据所属的 MSBuild 属性组/项定义组的标签。

span.span: The label of the MSBuild property group/item definition group to which a property/item definition metadata belongs to.
Default value is the empty string.
The label of the property or item group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为空字符串。The default value is the empty string.

example.span: 具有标签 Globals 的 MSBuild 属性组中的项目清单中存在的 VC + + 属性将为此字段提供此相同的值。

span.span: A VC++ property that exists in the project manifest in the MSBuild property group with label Globals would have this same value for this field.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于读/写此属性值的实际 MSBuild 属性名。

span.span: Gets or sets the actual MSBuild property name used to read/write the value of this property.

summary.span: 仅适用于 附加到属性的对象。

span.span: Applicable only to objects attached to properties.

value.span: 要使用的 MSBuild 属性名称;如果为 null ，则使用 作为 MSBuild 属性名称。

span.span: The MSBuild property name to use; or null to use the as the MSBuild property name.

para.span: 持久名称通常与中显示的属性名称相同 ，因此，此属性的值可以保留为默认值 null。

span.span: The persisted name will usually be the same as the property name as it appears in the and the value of this property can therefore be left at is default of null.

para.span: 由于属性名称必须是唯一的，但不需要在持久存储区中是唯一的 (因为数据源（如项) 类型）中的其他差异，因此可能存在在 XAML 文件中必须将规则属性名称更改为唯一的情况，但不更改属性在 MSBuild 文件中的保留方式。

span.span: Since property names must be unique but need not be unique in the persisted store (due to other differences in the data source such as item type) there may be times when Rule property names must be changed to be unique in the XAML file, but without changing how the property is persisted in the MSBuild file.

para.span: 在这种情况下，此属性会变得很有用。

span.span: It is in those cases where this property becomes useful.

para.span: 当专用生成环境中的属性名称必须与通常使用的名称不同以便保持与项目系统的兼容性时，它可能也很有用。

span.span: It may also be useful in specialized build environments where property names must differ from the normally used name in order to maintain compatibility with the project system.

span.span: The storage location for this data source.
The storage location for this data source.

remarks.span: 除非设置了，否则此字段是必需的 。

span.span: This field is mandatory unless is set.

remarks.span: 在这种情况下，父 对象将与指定的样式一起使用。

span.span: In that case, the parent will be used with the specified style.

remarks.span: 示例值为 ProjectFile 和 UserFile。

span.span: Example values are ProjectFile and UserFile.

remarks.span: ProjectFile 使属性值写入和读取项目清单文件或属性表， (具体取决于 "解决方案资源管理器/属性管理器" 窗口中的哪个节点用于生成属性页 UI) 。

span.span: ProjectFile causes the property value to be written to and read from the project manifest file or the property sheet (depending on which node in the solution explorer/property manager window is used to spawn the property pages UI).

remarks.span: UserFile 导致将属性值写入和读取该文件。

span.span: UserFile causes the property value to be written to and read from the .user file.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ PersistenceStyle { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.PersistenceStyle : string with get, set

span.span: The storage style for this data source.

remarks.span: 例如，对于 ProjectFile，此字段可以是 (默认) 的 元素 ，以另存为子 xml 元素，或将属性保存为 XML 特性的 属性 。

span.span: For example, with of ProjectFile, this field can be Element (default) to save as a child XML Element, or Attribute to save properties as an XML attribute.

span.span: The data type of the source.

summary.span: 在非空) 情况下，通常 (项、 ItemDefinition、 属性或 TargetResults 中的一个 。

span.span: Generally one of Item, ItemDefinition, Property, or TargetResults (when is non-empty).

summary.span: 除此之外，这也控制在生成过程中处理数据的方式。

span.span: Among other things this governs how the data is treated during build.
The data type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常具有值 `Item` 、 `ItemDefinition` 或 `Property` 。Typically has the value `Item`, `ItemDefinition`, or `Property`.

example.span: 此属性的 项 值指示此属性实际上是一个项数组，即由指定的项类型的所有项的列表 。

span.span: A value of Item for this property indicates that this property is actually an item array - the list of all items with the item type specified by .
